name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Mix together ground beef, bread crumbs, egg, onion, salt, and pepper in a bowl until well combined. Form into balls and place on a baking sheet.
Bake meatballs for 20-25 minutes or until fully cooked.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat up marinara sauce in a separate pot.
Combine spaghetti, meatballs, and sauce together in a large pot and stir until fully coated.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A classic Caesar salad topped with grilled chicken.
instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken on medium-high heat until fully cooked.
Chop romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese to the bowl.
Pour Caesar dressing over the salad and toss until fully coated.
Slice chicken breast and place on top of the salad.
